tasks.name: Prepare Lesson Plan
tasks.description: Create a comprehensive lesson plan for the upcoming semester.

subtasks.name: Research Curriculum
subtasks.description: Review and analyze the curriculum to identify key topics.

subtasks.name: Draft Weekly Plans
subtasks.description: Create a draft plan for each week's lessons.

subtasks.name: Create Assessment Materials
subtasks.description: Design quizzes and tests for student evaluations.

notes: Ensure all lesson plans align with the updated curriculum guidelines.
Incorporate feedback from previous semesters to improve the lesson structure.
Allocate time for interactive activities and student engagement.

tasks.name: Renovate Kitchen
tasks.description: Plan and execute the kitchen renovation project.

subtasks.name: Hire Contractor
subtasks.description: Find and hire a reputable contractor for the renovation.

subtasks.name: Select Materials
subtasks.description: Choose the materials and finishes for the kitchen.

subtasks.name: Approve Design
subtasks.description: Review and approve the final kitchen design.

notes: Ensure to get multiple quotes from contractors to find the best deal.
Consider energy-efficient appliances and sustainable materials.
Create a temporary kitchen setup during the renovation period.

tasks.name: Complete Research Paper
tasks.description: Write and submit the final research paper for the semester.

subtasks.name: Gather Sources
subtasks.description: Collect and organize all necessary research materials.

subtasks.name: Draft Outline
subtasks.description: Create an outline to structure the paper.

subtasks.name: Write First Draft
subtasks.description: Write the initial draft of the research paper.

notes: Schedule regular check-ins with your advisor to get feedback on your progress.
Ensure all sources are properly cited to avoid plagiarism.
Allow time for multiple revisions and proofreading.

tasks.name: Organize Team Meeting
tasks.description: Plan and arrange the quarterly team meeting.

subtasks.name: Book Conference Room
subtasks.description: Reserve a suitable conference room for the meeting.

subtasks.name: Prepare Agenda
subtasks.description: Create a detailed agenda for the meeting.

subtasks.name: Send Invites
subtasks.description: Send out meeting invitations to all team members.

notes: Confirm the availability of key team members before finalizing the meeting date.
Distribute the agenda in advance to allow team members to prepare.
Arrange for any necessary audiovisual equipment.

tasks.name: Plan Birthday Party
tasks.description: Organize a birthday party for the child.

subtasks.name: Create Guest List
subtasks.description: List all guests to be invited to the party.

subtasks.name: Order Cake
subtasks.description: Select and order a birthday cake.

subtasks.name: Book Venue
subtasks.description: Reserve a venue for the birthday party.

notes: Reach out to parents for dietary restrictions or allergies for the guests.
Plan fun activities and games for the children.
Ensure there is a backup plan in case of bad weather if the party is outdoors.

tasks.name: Launch Marketing Campaign
tasks.description: Develop and initiate a marketing campaign for the new product.

subtasks.name: Design Ads
subtasks.description: Create advertisements for the campaign.

subtasks.name: Select Platforms
subtasks.description: Choose platforms for running the ads.

subtasks.name: Set Budget
subtasks.description: Determine the budget for the campaign.

notes: Analyze competitor campaigns for insights on effective strategies.
Track and measure the performance of the campaign.
Allocate a portion of the budget for A/B testing.

tasks.name: Plan Vacation
tasks.description: Organize all aspects of the upcoming vacation.

subtasks.name: Book Flights
subtasks.description: Purchase flight tickets for the trip.

subtasks.name: Reserve Accommodations
subtasks.description: Book hotels or other accommodations.

subtasks.name: Create Itinerary
subtasks.description: Plan daily activities and sightseeing.

notes: Check for any travel restrictions or requirements for the destination.
Ensure all travel documents, including passports and visas, are up to date.
Research local attractions and make reservations for popular activities in advance.
